We're estatic that you'd like to help build the YaBB community by moderating a board. But you're probably asking yourself: "Uh, what does a Board Moderator do?"

The role of a Board Moderator is very important to the life and success of a board. There is a lot of responsibility in being a Board Moderator, but there's also a lot more fun.

This topic is broken up into four sections:
  • The Responsibilities Of A Board Moderator
  • What A Board Moderator Can See & Do
  • Actions A Board Moderator May Take
  • Tips For Being A Good Board Moderator
